paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: We were able to detect two additional causative mutations (BRCA1 c. 3671_3672insCTTC and BRCA2 c.2918C>A) that were not identified without the addition of the primer trimming function.

functional_data.summary: Detected through NGS and confirmed by Sanger sequencing.

variants.additional_notes: This variant was detected in a large cohort of patients.
key_quotes: We were able to detect two additional causative mutations (BRCA1 c. 3671_3672insCTTC and BRCA2 c.2918C>A) that were not identified without the addition of the primer trimming function.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data was comprehensive and clear regarding the BRCA2 variant.
